      • amplitudeModulate

        public int amplitudeModulate(Signal carrier,
                    double param,
                    double Scale)
        Returns instantaneous value of amplitude modulated signal. argument is a specifier that is relative to the url argument.

        This method is called on the modulating signal The carrier of the modulation process is specified in the parameters

        Parameters:
        carrier - Carrier signal
        param - value of variable x
        Scale - The Scale factor.
        Returns:
        Instantaneous value of the amplitude modulated signal.
        See Also:
        Signal
